details.history: The dungeon was created by a neutral wizard as a temple. Its creator was destroyed by a natural disaster, and the dungeon has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.
details.illumination: Shadowy (phosphorescent fungus or candles every 20 ft.)

east.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
east.secret: The door is concealed behind a statue of a terrified maiden, and opened by breaking her neck

south.desc: Locked Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 20 to break; 20 hp)
Trapped and Unlocked Simple Wooden Door (10 hp)

detail.room_features: A tile mosaic of arcane patterns covers the floor, and a pile of torn paper lies in the west side of the room

settings.name: The Dread Hive of Kas the Betrayer

wandering_monsters.1: Ogre Chain Brute (cr 3, motm 201, mtf 221) and 7 x Ogre (cr 2, mm 237); deadly, 3850 xp, wandering senselessly
wandering_monsters.2: Hobgoblin Captain (cr 3, mm 186) and 11 x Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); medium, 1800 xp, consumed by disease and madness
wandering_monsters.3: Kobold Scale Sorcerer (cr 1, motm 165, vgm 167) and 15 x Kobold (cr 1/8, mm 195); easy, 575 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
wandering_monsters.4: Flind (cr 9, motm 127, vgm 153) and 2 x Gnoll (cr 1/2, mm 163); hard, 5200 xp, investigating a strange noise
wandering_monsters.5: Young Brass Dragon (cr 6, mm 105); easy, 2300 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.6: Efreeti (cr 11, mm 145) and 1 x Fire Elemental (cr 5, mm 125); deadly, 9000 xp, hunting for food
